title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, December 27, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Louis Pasteur (1822) who discovered that most infectious diseases are caused by germs and that instituting sanitary conditions in hospitals could save many lives.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Louis Pasteur (1822) who discovered that most infectious diseases are caused by germs and that instituting sanitary conditions in hospitals could save many lives.
